_sText:
Credit:
Fo_ox - took the building from his awesome map - re_fy_big_city_v10 - http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/39170
Hulk model? - A random Zombie Mod I joined...?(please tell me If you know where)

How to Leave Comments:
If you have not played the map please DO NOT LEAVE A COMMENT, asserting I have stolen this map from other users is a false statement. Credit has BEEN given where it is needed.

General Facts:
The Hulk has enraged and is savaging destroying California City, The Government has one last option, the Special Opts, before they nuke the city.

Ct/Special Opts Objective:
After being briefed on the hulk's rampage you're sent into action to destroy the hulk, You hit the drop off point only to see the helicopter that you rode in on get destroyed, You're only objective is to destroy the hulk before the nuke is launched(ETA 3Minutes). ither destroy the Hulk or leave on the escape Copter...Or Die.

T/Hulk Objective:
After going into a fit of rage you destroy almost everyone in California City, when the Special Opts shows up and threatens your life you strike back with "Hulk Fist of Fury". Its Either destroy the Special Opts or leave on the escape Copter...Or Die.

FYI:
Nuke is Launched in 3 Minutes.
No Fall Damage.
According to how many Special Opts there are the Hulk gets a certain amount of HP.
Get Ammo from the Ammo Boxes at the drop off points.
Once 3 minutes have passed and the hulk is not dead/the special opts are not dead leave on the escape helicopter at the middle building.

Fix in Version 7:
Final version coming VERY SOON.
Fixed Switcher
Fixed round restart
Fixed Server crash.

Fixed the hulk hp caller
Fixed 

Fixed CT counter Chart Below:
# of Ct's      Hulk HP       Damage Hulk Does(excluding Knife)per sec
5		2000		30
10		3000		40
15		4000		50
You get the picture?

Fixed the Ct's after being the Hulk were still transparent.


Fixed the Hulk model so it stands closer to the terrorist to make them seem like one. =D


Fixed the floor bug. Thank you metagame community for all the great support =)

Watch the Video for Instruction Also.
